property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at this location encounters this barrier. If a character succeeds at a Wisdom or Perception 10 check, the difficulty of their check to defeat the barrier is decreased by 4. If a character defeats the barrier, it deals 1 Combat damage dealt to her; if a character fails to defeat the barrier, it deals 1d4+1 Combat dealt to her. Banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat the barrier is increased by the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. If defeated, examine the top card of the location deck and return it to either the top or bottom of the deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at this location summons and encounters a Skinsaw Cultist henchman. Each character at this location must discard 1 card from the to of her deck for each undefeated cultist. Banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at an open location summons and encounters a Zombie Minion henchman. If any character does not defeat the Zombie Minion, the Zombie Horde is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at this location summons and encounters a Zombie Minion henchman. If any character does not defeat the Zombie Minion, the Zombie Nest is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, succeed at a Wisdom 7 check or the difficulty to defeat the Faceless Stalker is increased by 2. If undefeated, the Faceless Stalker deals no damage; bury the top card of your deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, examine this location deck until you find a bane; encounter it, then shuffle Dr. Habe into this location deck. If there are no banes in the deck, shuffle it; Dr. Habe is defeated. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location; you may then examine the top 3 cards of a location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Ghoul Scarecrow is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Grayst is immune to the Mental trait. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Place the Haunt next to your character card. For each Haunt next to your character card, the difficulty of your checks is increased by 1. At the end of the scenario, banish all Haunts. When you encounter the Haunt, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, examine the top card of the Blessings discard pile. If the card is Blessing of the Gods, the difficulty to defeat Pidget is increased by 3. Before or after the encounter, you may banish a weapon with the slashing trait to banish Pidget. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may not play spells with the Attack trait. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, shuffle to top card of the blessings deck into this location deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Zombie Minion is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Damage dealt by the Zombie Minion is reduced by half (round up). If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Carrionstorm is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, return the Carrionstorm to the top of this location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, the Diseased Rats deal no damage; instead, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check or discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, succeed at a Wisdom 7 check or the difficulty to defeat the Faceless Stalker is increased by 2. If undefeated, the Faceless Stalker deals no damage; instead, bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Ghoul is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location must summon and enounter a Zombie Minion henchman. When you attempt a check to defeat Caizarlu Zerren, after you make the roll, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, start the check over. Cards played on the previous check do not affect the new check. All damage dealt by Caizarlu Zerren is Poison damage.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Undead Revenant

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Iesha is immune to the Mental and Poison Traits. If your check to defeat Iesha does not have the Magic trait, Iesha is undefeated. If defeated, choose a location deck and search it for the villain The Skinsaw Man. If you find him, set him aside; shuffle the rest of the deck and put him on either the top or bottom of that deck. If you encounter the Skinsaw Man this turn, the difficulty of all checks against him is decreased by 5.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Father Skinsaw has revealed to me the truths beneath flesh, and I judge all of Magnimar guilty!"

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, choose a character at your location; that character summons and encounters a random monster. If there are no other characters at your location, the difficulty to defeat Justice Ironbriar is increased by 1d4.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Phew! And I though it stank when the pigs got into the asparagus patch!" --Next-to-last words of Old Crade Hambley

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Rogors Craesby is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before the encounter, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check or the difficulty of all checks is increased by 1 for the rest of the turn. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Combat Divine

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "You, and you alone, have brought this fearful harvest." --Your Lordship

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Skinsaw Man is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If there are no other characters at your location, the difficulty of checks to defeat the Skinsaw Man is increased by 1d4. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "I trust your little band of murderers is doing well, gathering the greedy souls for our Lord's rise?"-- Note found in the Shadow Clock.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail a combat check, you may not play weapons or spells for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to examine the bottom 3 cards of a location deck and put them back in any order. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 13 check, discard this card instead of burying it. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to examine your location deck until you find a bane; shuffle the deck and put that card on top. Discard this card to explore your location

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to give a card to another character at any location. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 1. Recharge this card to reduce Ranged Combat damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon with the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Reveal this card to add the Magic trait to your combat check. Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. If you are proficient with light armors, you may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 2. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a check to defeat a barrier. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: If the top card of the blessing discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to defeat a barrier with the Lock trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d6 to your Stealth check. Recharge this card to succeed at your Stealth check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 1. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die +1d8+2; you may additionally discard this card to also reduce the difficulty to defeat the bane by 2 until the end of the turn. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you fail a combat check with this weapon, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a monster, you may display this card and put the monster atop it; the monster is neither defeated nor undefeated. At the end of your turn, put the monster on top of its original location deck and bury this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 4.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 9 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value:
Reveal this card to add 1 to your Dexterity check.
Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Poison damage dealt to you by 1.
Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury any number of blessings from your hand and your discard pile. Shuffle an equal number of random blessings from the blessings discard pile into the blessings deck. Banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the end of the turn, discard this card to move a willing character. Any movement restrictions still apply. Discard this card to explore your location. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to roll your Arcane die + 3d6 with the Electricity trait. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card when a character encounters a bane. Any character who encounters a monster this turn adds 1d6 with the Poison trait to her combat check. Discard this card at the end of this turn. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a monster whose highest difficulty to defeat is 16 or lower; put it on either the top or the bottom of the location deck. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 8 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d6+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6. If any d6 rolled for this weapon is a 6, count it as a 7.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Dexterity or Ranged die + 1d8+1. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 to a combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength of Melee die + 2d4+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d4. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If any d4 rolled on this weapon is a 4, count it as a 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d6+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d4+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d4. When playing another weapon, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 to the combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 2 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reveal Aldern Foxglove to banish all Haunts in front of characters.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at an Intelligence or Arcane 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A strangely cold sea wind rises to a keening shriek as a sagging, moldy mansion comes into view. The house is dark, but something darker skulks between the narrow windows.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal Aldern Foxglove to banish all Haunts in front of characters.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 2 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, attempt a Wisdom 6 check. If you succeed, draw a random card from your discard pile; if you fail, discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 7 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may shuffle 1d4-1 random cards from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Narrow windows, too thin to allow access inside, pierce the walls of this gloomy building. A cry rings from within, an unnerving noise somewhere between a moan and a maniacal laugh.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the start of your turn, attempt a Wisdom 6 check. If you succeed, draw a random card from your discard pile; if you fail, discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Add 2 to your checks with the Slashing trait.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This rustic sawmill is powered by a continually creaking and grinding waterwheel, a contraptioncapable of powering a massive saw. Even at rest the blade looks lethal, capable of easily splitting even the thickest tree trunk. Amid the scraps of wood, well-worn tools, and heaps of sawdust, a splash of crimson stains the floor, evidence of a brutal crime that occurred in the recent past.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 3 Weapon 1 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 0 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, recharge your hand and draw up to your handsize.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Banish an ally.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A crumbling stone angel rises atop this dying structure of weathered shingles, loose bricks and untrustworthy scaffolding. Taller than any nearby building, the tower sways ever so slightly despite the lack of even the slightest breeze. Just below its ominous winged guardian, the decrepit clock tower's face is frozen, defiantly proclaiming it to be three o'clock.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The dead stalk the streets of Sandpoint! The bloody trail leads to packs of ravenous undead and the haunted halls of Foxglove Manor. Behind this bloody spree is the Skinsaw Man, a ghoulish murder backed by the merciless Skinsaw Cult--the same sinister allies who backed Mualia. Pursuing the fiends to the city of Magnimar reveals the dark goals of these evil-minded fanatics and their mysterious leader, an "angel" hidden amid the dizzying heights of the towering Shadow Clock.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Undead Uprising Crow Bait Foul Misgivings The Cult Exposed Angel in the Tower

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character gains a card feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Skinsaw Cult was under the control of someone even more sinister than Justice Ironbriar. Atop the tower called the Shadow Clock lurks the strange "angel" Xanesha. Hunt down her minions in the slums and climb the rickety tower to defeat Xanesha and claim her mysterious treasures!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Shadow Clock Temple Shrine to Lamashtu City Gate Throne Room Mill Waterfront Desecrated Vault

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the Shadow Clock location is open and no character is there at the end of the turn, discard the top card of the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Scarecrow Golem Charmed Faceless Stalkers

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Impaler of Thorns, Medusa Mask, Sihedron Medallion, Snakeskin Tunic

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The outskirts of Sandpoint have been overrun by the ravenous dead! Whether lurking amid fields or hiding in darkened cellars, hungry corpses wait to strike. Head into the night to find the horrors tormenting Sandpoint's farmers and return them to their graves!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Farmhouse Wooden Bridge Guard Tower Woods Desecrated Vault General Store Apothecary Village House

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you discard more than 1 card as damage from a combat check, bury 1 of those cards.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Rogors Craesby

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Scarecrow Golem Ghoul Scarecrows

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character draws a random armor from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The lands and sheer cliffs around Foxglove Manor have been revealed as the source of the undead plaguing Sandpoint. Brave those haunted grounds and reveal the identity of the murderous master commanding the walking dead--the sadistic Skinsaw Man!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Foxglove Manor Farmhouse Warrens Academy Prison Deeper Dungeons Treacherous Cave Desecrated Vault

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a Haunt, put it in front of you. Then roll 1d6 and add the number of Haunts in front of all players. If the result is 5 or more, summon and encounter the villain Iesha Foxglove. If any character encounters the villain The Skinsaw Man, the ally Aldern Foxglove may not be played for the rest of the scenario.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: The Skinsaw Man

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Defeating the Skinsaw Man revealed his connection to an evil cult of Norgorber, god of murder, that has taken root in the nearby city of Magnimar. Follow the trail of these fanatics to the city and put an end to the dark congregation of Justice Ironbriar!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Mill City Gate Academy Temple Waterfront Shrine to Lamashtu Guard Tower Apothecary

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you acquire a spell, bury a card.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Justice Ironbriar

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Skinsaw Cultists

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character draws a random spell from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The dead are rising from their graves to terrorize the people of Sandpoint. Marks of their shuffling passage lead back to several ruins and the lonely sanatorium of Dr. Habe. Find out who's behind this foul necromancy and put an end to this sinister plot!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Habe's Sanitorium Mill Village House General Store The Old Light Desecrated Vault Thassilonian Dungeon Prison

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat a Zombie Minion henchman from a location deck, randomly select an open location and shuffle the Zombie Minion into that deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Caizarlu Zerren

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Pidget Tergelson Dr. Habe Grayst Sevilla Zombie Minions

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.
